Class SQLAverageValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.expr.SQLAverageValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SQLValue<AverageValue>, Targetted<AverageValue>

    public class SQLAverageValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements SQLValue<AverageValue>
    A SQLValue that generates an AverageValue from a combination of a sum SQLValue and a count field.
    Author:
    spb
